arts.ttl: Yamal hails Barca’s ‘very important win’ after losing ‘silly points’
arts.sum: Barcelona wonderkid Lamine Yamal was happy to see his team get back to winning ways in La Liga after losing “silly points” recently in the Spanish top flight. Yamal was back in the starting XI against Real Mallorca and played a key role in Barcelona’s 5-1 win at Son Moix which he admitted afterwards was an important victory.

arts.ttl: Three talking points from Real Mallorca 1-5 Barcelona
arts.sum: Lewandowski had a rest, Dani Olmo was back in the starting XI, while Ferran Torres, Frenkie de Jong and Pau Victor all scored. Raphinha and Lamine Yamal played starring roles again for Barca in Mallorca.

arts.ttl: Hard work and class win the day for Barca against Mallorca
arts.sum: Lamine Yamal, in the first half in particular, also looked like a player who didn’t have the fitness to put the Mallorca backline under pressure. The big lesson for me is that many of these Barca players coming back from injury are still not one hundred percent fit, and that’s a problem when you consider the physical demands of Flick’s playing style.

arts.ttl: Flick glad Barca’s ‘sh*tty’ November is over
arts.sum: Hansi Flick was a happy man on Tuesday after seeing his Barcelona team crush Real Mallorca 5-1 in La Liga . “We created many chances but we missed them and this time I am happy to have scored five goals.

arts.ttl: Barcelona star confirms ‘I am in the best form of my career’ after Mallorca
arts.sum: Barcelona star Raphinha has revealed his take that he currently finds himself in the best run of form of his career. Wide-man Raphinha, for his part, is of course fresh…

arts.ttl: Barcelona star matched Lionel Messi in win over Mallorca
arts.sum: Barcelona star Raphinha on Tuesday matched a benchmark set by club legend Lionel Messi. Barcelona are of course fresh off securing a return to winning ways. After making the trip…

arts.ttl: Mallorca 1-5 Barcelona: Match report and talking points as Raphinha shines in comfortable victory
arts.sum: Match report and talking points from Barcelona's deserved win over Mallorca.

arts.ttl: Hansi Flick confirms he changed his mind about resting one Barcelona star vs Mallorca

arts.ttl: Barcelona star answered his widespread critics with superb display vs Mallorca
arts.sum: One member of Hansi Flick’s Barcelona squad stepped up with a starring performance at the perfect time on Tuesday. The player in question? Frenkie de Jong. Midfielder De Jong was…

arts.ttl: Lamine Yamal Dazzles for Barcelona in Return: Takeaways From 5-1 Win vs. Mallorca
arts.sum: Barcelona ended a three game winless streak in La Liga and opened up a four point gap over Real Madrid atop the standings.
